meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Sell</kanji>, <kanji>sell</kanji>, sell. This is the attitude you need if you want to work in <vocabulary>sales</vocabulary> or do <vocabulary>sales</vocabulary>. You have to work on your <vocabulary>selling</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which means you need to know the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You know them both, hurray!
